images.caption: Figure 1:An example of the evaluation long-form factuality. The long-form response is broken down into subclaims and verified separately. The factual precision score can be calculated as the precision of all subclaims.
Figure 2:An overview of ourFactAlignframework. Top: the pipeline for long-form facutality assessment. Bottom: the long-form factuality alignment process.

header: 4FactAlign: Aligning Language Models for Long-form Factuality

images.caption: Figure 3:The precision-recall curve with varying ratios of data mixture. SFT denotes the supervised fine-tuned baseline. The labels denote the ratio of the precision data points used.
